rows.label: qst630408_msg0001
rows.name:
My father's a member of the mercenary
forces...

rows.label: qst630408_msg0002
rows.name:
He was sent off to Temperantia with
his squad, before the cease-fire.

rows.label: qst630408_msg0003
rows.name: But he's not come back yet...

rows.label: qst630408_msg0004
rows.name:
I tried to ask around down at the
barracks, but nobody would tell 
me anything!

rows.label: qst630408_msg0006
rows.name:
My dad's the reason I am who I am
today. I so want him to be there for
the wedding.

rows.label: qst630408_msg0007
rows.name: I just hope he gets home soon...
